citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:05 pm on 21-
August-2025. The responsible adult stated they could not leave their other business at the time. This responsible adult
mentioned a designated person might be available for inspection later that afternoon. Later on at around 1:11 pm, the
responsible adult texted APHIS Officials stating that the designated person would not be available that afternoon.. Failure
to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations.
Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:05 pm on 21-
August-2025. The responsible adult stated they could not leave their other business at the time. This responsible adult 
mentioned a designated person might be available for inspection later that afternoon. Later on at around 1:11 pm, the 
responsible adult texted APHIS Officials stating that the designated person would not be available that afternoon.. Failure 
to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. 
Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
